item.title: By: jeff
item.dc:creator: jeff
item.description: thansk for the feedback! now you can press left/right arrow keys to change date. but yes, i'm considering a better way for users to choose date more easily. assuming user only want to choose date in the following days, may we can show the following 3 days for user to click.
item.content:encoded:
thansk for the feedback! now you can press left/right arrow keys to change date. but yes, i’m considering a better way for users to choose date more easily.
assuming user only want to choose date in the following days, may we can show the following 3 days for user to click.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/05/24/worldtimebuddy/#comment-3697">jeff</a>.
That does look nice. I prefer having a better mechanism for switching between dates though.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to jeff.

That does look nice. I prefer having a better mechanism for switching between dates though.

item.title: By: jeff
item.dc:creator: jeff
item.description: timezonebuddy (http://worldclock.eztaps.com/) is another decent world clock/time convention tool you may love. more intuitive UI, even easier time convention. and it's ads free!
item.content:encoded: timezonebuddy (http://worldclock.eztaps.com/) is another decent world clock/time convention tool you may love. more intuitive UI, even easier time convention. and it’s ads free!
